entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
